LenovoDeviceInfo.description: This is Lenovo extended network device info properties.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Location.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate device location information.

UUID.description: This indicates Universal Unique ID of device.
